main event: A bright green streak-shaped object was observed in the sky, which disappeared by exploding in a burst of light.
interesting points: The object left a smoke trail estimated to be 55 feet long after the explosion., The duration of the sighting remains unknown., The object was possibly identified as an astronomical phenomenon, most likely a Bolide type meteor., Four airline pilots reported the sighting., The report indicates this event occurred at 0400 hours.
